revised_title: Effects of North Sea Oil and Gas Developments on Fisheries: Environmental Impacts and Mitigation Measures
tldr: This article discusses the environmental effects of North Sea oil and gas developments on the fishing industry and marine ecosystems. It highlights the challenges, such as operational incompatibilities and competition for resources, as well as the various pollutants introduced by the industry. The article also covers the measures taken to minimize pollution threats and ongoing research to understand the full impact on the marine ecosystem.
